Class AbstractPuzzleGenerator<P>

  • java.lang.Object

    PuzzleGenerator, QuestionPuzzleGenerator

public abstract class AbstractPuzzleGenerator<P>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.function.Supplier<P>

    • Method Detail

      • generate

        public P generate()

        Tip: one can generate several puzzles quickly with a parallel stream: 

         Stream.generate.parallel
        Returns:
        a new puzzle generated from the seed solution and randomness source; each generated puzzle is different and has a minimal set of facts

      • get

        public P get()
        Specified by:
        get in interface java.util.function.Supplier<P>

      • uniqueSolution

        protected boolean uniqueSolution(P puzzle)
        If the puzzle has a unique solution
        Parameters:
        puzzle - required
        Returns:
        false, if the puzzle has no or multiple solutions

      • countSolutions

        protected abstract int countSolutions(P puzzle)
        Parameters:
        puzzle - required
        Returns:
        number of unique solutions of the given puzzle

      • rejectFact

        protected boolean rejectFact(Fact fact)
        Checks if the fact is not compatible with the specific puzzle being generated

        By default, all facts are compatible and none are rejected.

        Parameters:
        fact -
        Returns:
        if the fact is rejected

      • removeFacts

        protected void removeFacts(java.util.List<Fact> facts)
        Reduce the initial list of all compatible facts to the facts to use in the generated puzzle

        Implementations typically override either this method or uniqueSolution(P) with a more efficient solution.

        Parameters:
        facts - initial list of facts with which the puzzle has a unique solution
